segments.text: good afternoon , madam . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , I am a little bit out of shape . I think I should get some exercise to keep fit . what kind of service do you offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: first of all , we'll tailor a work-out plan according to your physical conditions and your personal needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how can you get that done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , we give each of our customers a qualified personal trainer . The trainer will give you a fitness assessment and then come up with the work-out plan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: since everyone is different , your personal trainer will help you find out all the exercise equipments that are suitable for you fitness level . Then you'llbe taught all the necessary techniques to us
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sounds pretty good . How much do you charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that depends . We offer membership for one month , half a year and one year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: perhaps one month . I'll just have a try at first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: wise decision . that is 400 yuan . You'll find it's totally worth it .
segments.speaker: S1
